{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'sqlite3.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)

cur = conn.cursor()

cur.execute(
    'CREATE TABLE todo(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, task STRING, isAchieved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)')

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["def create_todo(e, task):
  conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
  cur = conn.cursor()
  cur.execute('INSERT INTO todo(task) VALUES (?)',(task,))
  conn.commit()
  cur.close()
  conn.close()
  page.go("/")"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["def fetch_todo():
	  conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
	  cur = conn.cursor()
	  cur.execute('SELECT * FROM todo')
	  rows = cur.fetchall()
	  todo_list = []
	  for row in rows:
	      todo = Todo(id=row[0],task=row[1],isAchieved=row[2] == 1,created_at=row[3])
	      todo_list.append(todo)
	  conn.commit()
	  cur.close()
	  conn.close()
	  controls = []
	  for todo in todo_list:
			  text = ft.Text(todo.task)
			  if todo.isAchieved:
            text.style = ft.TextStyle(decoration=ft.TextDecoration.LINE_THROUGH)
	      controls.append(
	          ft.Row([
			          ft.Checkbox(),
	              text,
	              ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.DELETE)
	          ]))
	  todo_list_control.controls = controls
	  page.update()"],"caption":[]}

line":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"の","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"controls属性","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"の値として代入します。これでデータベースから取得したページに表示されます。","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["def delete_todo(e, id):
  conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
  cur = conn.cursor()
  cur.execute('DELETE FROM todo WHERE id = ?',(id,))
  conn.commit()
  cur.close()
  conn.close()
  fetch_todo()"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["def check_todo(e, isAchieved, id):
    if isAchieved:
        isAchieved = 0
    else:
        isAchieved = 1
    conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute('UPDATE todo SET isAchieved = ? WHERE id = ?',(isAchieved, id))
    conn.commit()
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    fetch_todo()"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["if template_route.match("/create"):
  createTextField = ft.TextField(hint_text="TODO")
  appbar.leading = ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.ARROW_BACK, on_click=lambda _:page.go("/"))
  page.views.append(
      ft.View(
          "/create",
          appbar=appbar,
          controls=[
              ft.Text("TODO作成"),
              createTextField,
              # 作成機能実装
              ft.ElevatedButton(text="作成",on_click=lambda e:create_todo(e, createTextField.value))
          ]
      )
  )"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["elif template_route.match("/"):
  appbar.leading = ft.Text("")
  floating_button = ft.FloatingActionButton(
      icon=ft.icons.ADD,
      bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_200,
      on_click=lambda _: page.go("/create")
  )
  # データを取得
  fetch_todo()
  page.views.append(
      ft.View(
          "/",
          appbar=appbar,
          controls=[todo_list_control],
          floating_action_button=floating_button
      )
  )"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"fetch_todo","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"を実行することによって、ホームページにアクセスするたびに毎回データを取得して、それが","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"todo_list_control","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"に反映され、データが表示されるようになりました。","href":null}]}

{"icon":{"type":"external","external":{"url":"https://www.notion.so/icons/code_gray.svg"}},"color":"default_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"fetch_todo関数","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["def fetch_todo():
  conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
  cur = conn.cursor()
  cur.execute('SELECT * FROM todo')
  rows = cur.fetchall()
  todo_list = []
  for row in rows:
      todo = Todo(id=row[0],task=row[1],isAchieved=row[2] == 1,created_at=row[3])
      todo_list.append(todo)
  conn.commit()
  cur.close()
  conn.close()
  controls = []
  for todo in todo_list:
      text = ft.Text(todo.task)
      if todo.isAchieved:
          text.style = ft.TextStyle(decoration=ft.TextDecoration.LINE_THROUGH)
      controls.append(
          ft.Row([
		          # チェック機能実装
              ft.Checkbox(on_change=lambda e, isAchieved=todo.isAchieved, id=todo.id:check_todo(e, isAchieved,id)),
              text,
              # 削除機能実装
              ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.DELETE,on_click=lambda e,id=todo.id: delete_todo(e, id))
          ]))
  todo_list_control.controls = controls
  page.update()"],"caption":[]}
